title: On the Differences Between Robot Bunnies and Bunny Robots
content:
They may seem like the same thing, but they most certainly are not. But don't worry. It is a common misconception. If you think about it, the difference is quite clear. Robot bunnies are quite obviously artificial rabbits controlled by electromechanical systems that are programmed to demonstrate automatic rabbit behaviour (which is to eat and breed).
The defining criteria is that it is a robot that resembles a bunny. Bunny robots are robots built by the rabbits as part of their efforts to destroy the human race and take over the world. They do not have to resemble rabbits at all. There is nothing wrong with robot bunnies - they're actually quite cute, but if you ever see a bunny robot, then run...

Just thought I'd clear that up...
